summary: The story of trench life during World War I through the lives of a French regiment. As men are killed and replaced jaunty Lt. Denet becomes more and more somber. His rival for the affection of nurse Monique is Capt. La Roche.
cast: Fredric March|Warner Baxter|Lionel Barrymore|June Lang|Gregory Ratoff|Victor Kilian|Paul Stanton|John Qualen|Julius Tannen|Theodore von Eltz|Paul Fix|Leonid Kinskey|Jacques Lory|Jacques Vanaire|Edythe Raynore|George Warrington|Raymond Aimos|Antonin Artaud|Pierre Blanchar|John Bleifer|Eugene Borden|Barlowe Borland|Robert Cauterio|Jess Cavin|Joe Cunningham|Jean De Briac|Curley Dresden|Eddie Foster|Constant Franke|Gabriel Gabrio|Robert Graves|Karl Hackett|Ben Hendricks Jr.|George Kerebel|Baron James Lichter|Frank McGlynn Jr.|Paul McVey|Louis Mercier|Anne O'Neal|Jack Pennick|Jean Perry|Bryson Rogers|Hector V. Sarno|Wingate Smith|Nicholas Soussanin|Charles Vanel|Pat West
title: El camino de la gloria
